title: WTT T206 Stahl Glove Shows SGC 50
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: WTT T206 Stahl Glove Shows SGC 50
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade this nice SGC 50 Stahl - Glove Shows. Just won a 2nd copy (American Beauty back) in last night's Brockelman & Luckey action (thanks guys!). I'm looking for any of the following:

Lower Grade (SGC & PSA are both fine) 2nd tier HOFer (i.e. Bresnahan, Beckley, Joe Kelley, etc)

Lower Grade Southern Leaguer (looking for Bastian, Coles, Foster, Fritz, Hickman, Hooker, Lafitte, Manion, Stark, Thebo and White).

Lower Grade Cycle 460 back

Similar grade (again, both SGC and PSA are fine):
Any horizontal poses 
Abbaticchio Brown Sleeves
Adkins
Ball Pitching
Beaumont
Dahlen Boston
Herzog Boston
Pfiester Sitting
Reulbach Both Hands
Tenney
Titus
Zimmerman

Also looking for Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 25 and Factory 30 backs

Please PM with any offers & Thanks for looking! I figured that I would list the card here for 3 days and then throw it out on ebay.

Steve
